title.rendered: Best Places to Visit in Ayodhya

content.rendered:
Ayodhya, also known as Saket, Awadh, or Oudh City, is an ancient city located near Faizabad in northern India. According to the Ramayana, it is believed to have been founded by Manu, the legendary lawgiver of Hindu tradition. Situated on the banks of the River Ghaghara (or Gogra), Ayodhya has a rich history, having served for centuries as the capital of the Surya Vansh dynasty, with Lord Rama celebrated as its most revered king.

As one of the holiest cities in India, Ayodhya holds great religious significance, especially in Hinduism. It is the birthplace of Lord Rama, one of the most important deities in the Hindu pantheon, drawing millions of pilgrims from across the country. During religious festivals or important ceremonies, many devotees visit Ayodhya to take a holy dip in the sacred Saryu River, which is believed to cleanse the soul.

In ancient times, Ayodhya was also referred to as Kosaldesha, and the Atharvaveda describes it as a city created by the gods, rich and prosperous like a paradise. The city is said to have once been home to thousands of temples, though around 100 significant ones have been identified today. It is also believed that Ikshvaku, the eldest son of Vaivasvata Manu, established the city of Ayodhya as a prosperous kingdom.

Ayodhya Ram Mandir

  • A grand temple dedicated to Lord Ram.
  • Located at the site believed to be Lord Ram’s birthplace.
  • Construction began in 2020 after years of legal disputes.
  • A symbol of religious and cultural significance for Hindus.

Ayodhya Ram Mandir is believed to be the birth place of Ram – the seventh incarnation of Vishnu. The time since this city has emerged out, it has been known for performing many rituals and Yajnas which also included the ‘Ashvamedha Yajna’.

The follower of Hindu Religion firmly believes in this and takes a deep interest in performing these rituals. Ayodhya rose, from the Puranic and epic ages to a prominence city in times of Buddha, i.e., in 6th century. Ayodhya being the city of several temples and rituals also know known for growing up faith of many and prospering in the same at a regular interval of times in the history. The remnants of Jainism, Buddhism and Hinduism can be found in Ayodhya. Ram Mandir is being ranked as among the seven cities in India that are sacred by Skand and Puranas. This place was first innovated as the core place of events to be held, but with due course of time it gradually rose to a town of temple.

Being the birth place of Ram, many Hindu followers’ wishes to visit this holy place only a life time to pay a visit and make their life successful. Even the poor people pray hard to visit Ayodhya Ram Mandir once in their whole life.

The town comprises of the temples, places, other historical monuments, all pledged the glory of Rama. Many others mostly visit the place in order to take part in the holy dip at the holy and religious river. Every year lots of people are estimated to visit this city. People along with their family, friends, and children do come to visit this place and returns back with lots of blessings and gifts. Many even do come here and seek wishes to be fulfilled here in Ayodhya Temple. Many Hindu scholars, learned-person takes this place for meditation and a medium to gain more and more knowledge and to get their life fulfilled with happiness. This is the reason why once in a life time, everyone wishes to visit this place and make their life successful.

Places to Visit in Ayodhya Temple

Ramkot

  • A historic fort-like area in Ayodhya.
  • Known for its association with Lord Ram’s childhood and events from the Ramayana.
  • Home to many small temples and religious sites.
  • Offers panoramic views of the city and is an important pilgrimage site.

The most fascinating and place of attraction in Ayodhya temple is Ramkot. It is also the chief place for worshipping in the city. The ancient fortress of Ramkot in Ayodhya Temple proudly stands on the elevated level of ground that too in the western part of this city. Known for its beauty and hostile services, this place attracts many devotees from all across the country. Most amazingly, people from across the globe visit the place and take a deep interest to know about it. On the birth anniversary of Ram, which is known as ‘Ram Navami’, people of this city celebrate it with full enjoyment and with great pomp-show. It is mostly celebrated in the Month of Chaitra i.e. from March to April. Every house cooks the best and delicious dishes on this eve and has a feast.

People visit their relatives and also share the gift among each other. Huge number of people seriously gets attracted to visit this particular place. People from abroad are more excited to visit this place and explore the historical importance of it. This particular place has become the main hub and all pilgrims surely pay a visit to this particular place. During Ram Navami, the enormous crowd can be seen submerged in prayer and other offering to the Lord Rama. The historical importance of Ramkot is well known to people and which is considered as one of the leading place to visit during Ayodhya trip.

The Hanuman Garhi

  • A prominent temple dedicated to Lord Hanuman.
  • Believed to be the spot where Hanuman appeared to help Lord Ram.
  • Known for its large idol of Hanuman and vibrant religious atmosphere.
  • A major pilgrimage destination for devotees of Lord Hanuman.

The Hanuman Garhi is mainly situated in the center most location of the town. This particular temple has been approached by a number of 76 flights of steps, which makes it more beautiful and unique from others. Hanuman is believed to have lived in this temple (earlier it was a cave) and had been protecting this birth place (Janmabhoomi) of Ram. The central part of the temple also holds up an idol of Goddess Anjani where Bal-Hanuman or Child Hanuman is seen seating on her lap. A big number of faithful visitors pays their visit to this temple and seek wishes, which also get fulfilled. Many visits this temple because of this same reason and gets their wishes fulfilled. The main structure of this temple is remarkably perfect with round shaped of bastions at each of the corner, making a house of Hanuman which is considered the popular shrine in the Ayodhya Temple.

Most of the people worship Lord Hanuman and this particular place is visited by many people. This temple has become extremely famous in the present time and more number of visitors paying homage to this temple. This temple is having its own importance in the history. Lord Hanuman is a keen follower of Lord Rama and hence he always use to serve him. Lord Hanuman spends his whole life in serving his master. The main temple is built on a cave, where Lord Hanuman was residing. He mainly uses to guard the main temple of Ayodhya. The look of the temple is quite marvelous and the 76 steps make the entire trip a best one.

Nageshwarnath Temple

  • Dedicated to Lord Shiva, part of the 12 Jyotirlingas of India.
  • The temple is believed to have been established by Lord Ram’s son, Kush.
  • A significant religious site for Hindus.
  • Attracts devotees for its serene atmosphere and ancient architecture.

Kush, one of the sons of Ram, is also said to have built this temple. The Nageshwarnath has been established exceptionally beautifully at this place. History gives us the details that the son of Ram, Kush, while taking a bath in the river of Sarayu have lost his armlet which was later picked up through a Nag-Kanya (Snake-Girl), who got in love with Kush. As the girl was the devotee of the Lord Shiva, thus Kush built up this shrine for her. Till the main time of Vikramaditya, this temple have been able to survived, and last without any problem whereas the rest of the city has been ruined with due course of time and had fallen down and now is left only as a dense, thick forest. Just because of this location, Vikramaditya found out the site of Ayodhya and located different of shrines here.

Shivratri, the festival of Shiv, is celebrated in this city with immense joy and pomp. This temple is the oldest one and hence people try to pay a visit to this temple. All other temples were ruined except this temple. Hence the importance is more influential in the present time. The shape of the temple resembles the structure of the temples use to be built during the recent times. This is rated among the most famous and captivating attractions near Ayodhya. People never forget to leave this particular spot and hence explore to know its actual importance in present time.

Treta Ke Thakur

  • A temple dedicated to Lord Ram, Sita, Lakshman, and Hanuman.
  • Believed to be the place where Lord Ram performed the “Ashvamedha Yagna” during the Treta Yuga.
  • Houses idols of Lord Ram and his family.
  • Popular for its spiritual significance and historical relevance.

This temple holds the memory of Ram, where, it is also said that he had performed the Ashvamedha Yajna. King of Kullu, about 300 years ago have built up this temple which was later on improved by the Ahilyabai Holkar in Indore in 1784. From Saryu the idols were recovered and were placed in new structure of the temple which is now famous as the Kaleram-Ka-Mandir. The whole city was destroyed in the past, and this temple is being re constructed. Since the idol of Ram is black in color, hence the name of the temple is Kalaram ji Mandir. People visit the temple to have a look of the black idol of Shri Ram.

This has also become other kind of attraction near Ayodhya. Visitors make sure to visit this temple and take blessings. Huge number of scriptures can be found on the temple and which was according to the older times. It was build 300 years before and re-modified in order to provide a compelling look. The scriptures on the temple forward some message to the people. All these activities were done in order to pay respect to Lord Rama, who was the ruler of Ayodhya. People in India do have a strong belief in Lord Rama and hence follow his instructions to make their life better and peaceful.

Kanak Bhawan

  • A beautiful temple dedicated to Lord Ram and Sita.
  • Built in a traditional architectural style with golden domes.
  • Located near the Ram Janmabhoomi and associated with the royal family of Ayodhya.
  • The temple features ornate decorations and is an important pilgrimage site.

This is one of the most famous temples in Ayodhya and all devotees try to visit because of its best importance in the past. This temple is exceptionally nice and is located in Ayodhya and is also near to the Hanuman Garhi. This particular temple has become the most powerful kind of spot for large numbers of visitors. There are a large number of images of Sita and Lord Ram. The entire temple is particularly famous because of the various images of Lord Ram and Sita. The images reveal Sita and Lord Rama wearing golden crowns. This is the main reason as to why the main temple is also referred to as golden house. There is a long history behind this temple. Rani Kaikai gifted this to Sita after her marriage.

Kaikey was the stepmother for Lord Ram and who was also responsible for the forest life for Lord Ram. This temple was thus gifted to Sita and which has undergone various kinds of restorations. The look of the main temple was different and which was modified by many kings. The present temple that stands in its place was modified by Rani Krishna Bhanu. The importance of Kanak Bhawan is well known to people. Visitors from all across the globe are truly much interested to explore the exact behind all temples in Ayodhya. The increase in the craze to explore Ayodhya is helping the government to raise their revenues. Every year large number of pilgrims comes to visit the Ayodhya and other notable temples.

Best Hotels in Ayodhya

Ayodhya is one of the best attractions in India and hence best hotel facilities are also present in that location. Hotels are always busy all-round the year.

The Pathik Niwas Hotel

The Pathik Niwas Hotel is one of the best prime hotels and which accommodates substantial number of people. Huge numbers of visitors select this particular hotel for getting perfect service at a remarkably affordable rate. There are very considerable numbers of reviews present for the same hotel. The rooms of the hotel are very neat and clean. This looks to be very attractive to the visitor, and hence the business of the hotel is sky rocketed. The interior of the hotel is built with the best kind of architecture and which enhances the charm of the entire hotel. There are other kinds of facilities, which is provided by the hotel. This includes better parking area, money exchange facility and many more. This is really going to be the best hotel in place and whose main motive is to provide best kind of service to the visitors.

Shri Ram Hotel

Shri Ram hotel is another best kind of hotel and which is named after Lord Shri Ram. This hotel also tries to serve the visitors in a very descent manner. There are a good number of rooms present in the hotel, and that are well ventilated and well maintained too. All these kind of features of the rooms are dragging the visitors’ attractions towards it. The charge of the hotel is not that high, and people can easily afford the price for the level of comfort that is provided. Door service is provided by the service people present in the hotel. The rooms are having all kinds of important facilities and which is mostly required by people. The well maintained bathrooms are of the best quality and helps in getting proper refresh after a very long time out. All these features are making this hotel a huge hit in the present time.

Tirupati Hotel

Tirupati Hotel is another important kind of hotel and which mainly serves most of the visitors. The exterior and the interior look of the hotel is amazing, and which is getting good customers. The quality of the service is entirely different from that of other hotels. The wide reception of the hotel helps people to sit and relax for a while. The hotel caters good people for service purpose. The service people can help in various kinds of aspects. Food facility is provided by the hotel and hence visitors need not to go outside for their foods. There are other best kinds of service provided by the hotel. The respective person from the hotel can arrange the taxi or other mode of transport to explore the entire city of Ayodhya. Many other kinds of services can also be taken from the hotel representatives.

Rahi Yatri Niwas

Rahi Yatri Niwas is one of the superb kinds of hotel, and that is getting better reviews than any other hotel. Good number of visitors can easily accommodate in the hotel. The rooms of the hotel are really fantastic and which attract the people. The interior of the hotel is built by good architect and which again enhances the beauty of it. Each and every kind of facilities is maintained in the hotel. People most often try to take accommodation in this hotel. The charge in the hotel is quite affordable and which also matches the quality of service that is delivered. The location of this hotel is near to the main city and hence, easily accessible by all visitors. The hotel people also arrange best transport facility for the convenience of the visitors.

Ram Dham Guest House

Ram Dham Guest house is another best kind of location and that can really serve in one of the best kind of manner. Various visitors select this hotel because of the level and nature of service that are provided to the guests. Accommodation is the prime service and which is well maintained by the people in the hotel. There are lots of other things and which are to be well maintained in the hotel. The food facility inside the hotel will help people to have their best kind of meals. The price of the entire service is affordable and common people will also like to spend such amount for high quality service. The hotel also provides better car parking, dining hall, money exchange and other kinds of facilities.

The sacred land of Ayodhya is always rushed with visitors from all across the globe. The rich historical background is the main driving force and which makes the trip unforgettable one. The main city of Ayodhya is having best kind of climate. Summer season is very hectic in this city, and the temperature can rise till 47 degrees. So this is not the exact time to make a trip to this city. Monsoons are warmly welcomed in the city, and the time duration of the monsoon is July till September. The roads become slippery and hence it is not advised to pay a visit to this place. Winter season is the best season and temperature can fall till 10 degrees. Thus, the best time to visit Ayodhya is between October to March. This particular time is best for the visitors in order to properly explore the city.

There are various numbers of ways to reach the main temple of Ayodhya. People from all across India like to prefer for various kinds of means for best trips. One can easily make a trip to Ayodhya through air, rail or road. The nearest airport is 8 km away from Ayodhya. The main airport is around 140 kilometers from the city and hence people can easily take a taxi or bus service to cover the distance between the airports to the main city of Ayodhya. There are two stations, which are helping visitors to visit Ayodhya. The two stations are Ayodhya and Faizabad. Super-fast trains are present and which connects Ayodhya to the rest of part of India. People willing can get down in either of the station and visit Ayodhya. Road is also the best means to visit Ayodhya, and there are various number of roads connecting the main city. One can take best bus or taxi service to reach the sacred land of Ayodhya.
